parameters.name: BgpAs
parameters.description: The BGP autonomous system number (ASN) to be configured for the Smart Access Gateway (SAG) device.

parameters.name: CeIp
parameters.description: The peer IP address when the SAG device is connected to the cloud.

parameters.name: EccId
parameters.description: The ID of the ECC instance.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the ECC instance.

parameters.name: PeIp
parameters.description: The on-premises IP address when the SAG device is connected to the cloud.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the ECC instance.
